class.name: Curve
class.description: A curve that can be saved and re-used for other objects. By default, it ranges between [code]0[/code] and [code]1[/code] on the Y axis and positions points relative to the [code]0.5[/code] Y position.

method.name: add_point
method.description: Adds a point to the curve. For each side, if the [code]*_mode[/code] is [constant TANGENT_LINEAR], the [code]*_tangent[/code] angle (in degrees) uses the slope of the curve halfway to the adjacent point. Allows custom assignments to the [code]*_tangent[/code] angle if [code]*_mode[/code] is set to [constant TANGENT_FREE].

method.name: bake
method.description: Recomputes the baked cache of points for the curve.

method.name: clean_dupes
method.description: Removes points that are closer than [code]CMP_EPSILON[/code] (0.00001) units to their neighbor on the curve.

method.name: clear_points
method.description: Removes all points from the curve.

method.name: get_point_count
method.description: Returns the number of points describing the curve.

method.name: get_point_left_mode
method.description: Returns the left [enum TangentMode] for the point at [code]index[/code].

method.name: get_point_left_tangent
method.description: Returns the left tangent angle (in degrees) for the point at [code]index[/code].

method.name: get_point_position
method.description: Returns the curve coordinates for the point at [code]index[/code].

method.name: get_point_right_mode
method.description: Returns the right [enum TangentMode] for the point at [code]index[/code].

method.name: get_point_right_tangent
method.description: Returns the right tangent angle (in degrees) for the point at [code]index[/code].

method.name: interpolate
method.description: Returns the Y value for the point that would exist at the X position [code]offset[/code] along the curve.

method.name: interpolate_baked
method.description: Returns the Y value for the point that would exist at the X position [code]offset[/code] along the curve using the baked cache. Bakes the curve's points if not already baked.

method.name: remove_point
method.description: Removes the point at [code]index[/code] from the curve.

method.name: set_point_left_mode
method.description: Sets the left [enum TangentMode] for the point at [code]index[/code] to [code]mode[/code].

method.name: set_point_left_tangent
method.description: Sets the left tangent angle for the point at [code]index[/code] to [code]tangent[/code].

method.name: set_point_right_mode
method.description: Sets the right [enum TangentMode] for the point at [code]index[/code] to [code]mode[/code].

method.name: set_point_right_tangent
method.description: Sets the right tangent angle for the point at [code]index[/code] to [code]tangent[/code].

method.name: set_point_value
method.description: Assigns the vertical position [code]y[/code] to the point at [code]index[/code].

signal.name: range_changed
signal.description: Emitted when [member max_value] or [member min_value] is changed.
